department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two panel huipil with slit neck opening, vertical tucks; indigo warp with light weft at bottom;  supplementary weft patterning in red, yellow, green, blue; designs consist of wide bands of geometric pattern; purple silk ribbon border and rosettes at the neck and arm openings.
dimension: 24 3/4 x 31 1/2 in. (62.87 x 80 cm) (at low edge)
medium: Cotton; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning, appliqu√©
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
